for a stiffer wing stuff periodically row 17 single_crochet around 6 row 18 single_crochet increase 3 times 9 row 19 single_crochet around 9 tie off leave a long tail for sewing horns x2 row 1 chain 5 turn row 2-3 single_crochet 4 turn row 4 sl flo of last row to chain row tie off leave a long tail for sewing assembly if not using safety eyes embroider or sew them on in preferred place sew the horns on just behind the eyes attach front legs near front of body set slightly wider than the eyes attach hind legs in line with front legs the higher flaps should sit on the side of the body to form haunches marked by red line attach wings above the front legs
